acls-import.name: acls.import.xdmod.public_user
acls-import.description: Imports the Public User if it does not already exist.

acls-import.name: acls.import.xdmod.user_acls
acls-import.description: Imports the records that relate which Users should have which Acls for xdmod

acls-import.name: acls.import.xdmod.user_acl_group_by_parameters
acls-import.description: Imports the records which denote a value to use for a particular User / Acl / Group By combination for xdmod

acls-import.name: acls.import.xdmod.user_acl_group_by_parameters_sync
acls-import.description: Syncs current user_acl_group_by_parameters records w/ all 'provider' group_bys
